title: Willis Harlem Seen and Photo of Sport - context

content.question: Based on Source 1 and Source 2, which of the following statements best exemplifies a goal of Harlem Renaissance artists?

choices.label: The artists wanted to counteract negative stereotypes.
The artists wanted to create works of art that were accepted by white society.
The artists wanted to highlight the struggle African Americans face.
The artists wanted to show the conformity of Harlem Renaissance art.

content.answer: The artists wanted to counteract negative stereotypes.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's perspective, purpose, context, and audience.
